mapper.select: SELECT TITLE , SUBJECT , P_IDX , (SELECT COUNT(TITLE) FROM TB_BLOG_M) AS TITLE_COUNT , (SELECT count(SUBJECT) FROM TB_BLOG_M WHERE SUBJECT = M.SUBJECT AND TITLE = M.TITLE) AS SUBJECT_COUNT , (SELECT count(SUBJECT) FROM TB_BLOG_M) AS TOTAL_SUBJECT_COUNT FROM TB_BLOG_M M;
SELECT TITLE FROM TB_BLOG_M M GROUP BY TITLE;
